name: liturgy-components-js
description: Liturgical calendar components for javascript: create an html select populated with liturgical calendars supported by the Liturgical Calendar API; create a form with parameters that are supported by the Liturgical Calendar API; create a webcalendar

scripts.minify: yarn pnpify gulp compress && yarn pnpify gulp bundle

author: John R. D'Orazio <priest@johnromanodorazio.com
